sections.heading: Inquest; subpoenas; power to issue
sections.text: The coroner may issue subpoenas within the county for witnesses, returnable forthwith, or at such time and place as the coroner shall therein direct.SourceLaws 1879, § 102, p. 382;R.S.1913, § 5668;C.S.1922, § 4998;C.S.1929, § 26-1507;R.S.1943, § 23-1806;Laws 1979,
